overview: In his Directorial Debut, Ricky Rodriguez tells the story of a young man who's up for an amazing job opportunity, only to be told he has to take a surprise drug test in order to officially be hired. As a common cannabis user, the quest for a solution becomes imminent for Benny!
tagline: It doesn't matter how high his chances are... what matters is how high he is.
title: You're in Trouble
